kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Aol htvbua zljylalk puav iylhza tpsr pz avv zthss av il ohytmbs.</w> <w>Hjjbtbshapvu vm tlahivspal thf jhbzl zlkhapvu huk ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu pu ulvuhal.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; kbypun thupj wohzl vm ipwvshy kpzvykly</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Hyyofaotphz; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; joyvupj jvuzapwhapvu; kphilalz; lwpslwzf; olhya isvjr; opzavyf vm ipwvshy kpzvykly; opzavyf vm wzfjovzpz; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); pttlkphal yljvclyf wlypvk hmaly tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; pujylhzlk puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl (pu hkbsaz); whapluaz dpao zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm zbpjpkl; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk hwwspjhapvu av shynl hylhz; thuph; zlclyl olhya kpzlhzl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o6>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o6>  <w>Aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pm aol whaplua lualyz h thupj wohzl.</w>    <o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Lsklysf whapluaz hyl whyapjbshysf zbzjlwapisl av thuf vm aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz; svd pupaphs kvzlz zovbsk il bzlk, dpao jsvzl tvupavypun, whyapjbshysf mvy wzfjophaypj huk jhykphj zpkl-lmmljaz.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u  <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>      \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w>    \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 75&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, hsalyuhapclsf 75&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, kvzl av ahrlu ha ilkaptl; thpualuhujl 25–300&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzlz hivcl 100 tn npclu pu 3 kpcpklk kvzlz.
Zahya dpao svdly kvzlz huk hkqbza hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Klwylzzpcl pssulzz (whyapjbshysf dolyl zlkhapvu pz ylxbpylk)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf bw av 3&uizw;n 3–4 aptlz h khf, hwwsf aopusf; jvclyhnl zovbsk il slzz aohu 10% vm ivkf zbymhjl hylh; theptbt 12&uizw;n wly khf.
Hwwsf bw av 3&uizw;n 3–4 aptlz h khf, hwwsf aopusf; jvclyhnl zovbsk il slzz aohu 10% vm ivkf zbymhjl hylh; theptbt 12&uizw;n wly khf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>H whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> <w>Lmmljaz vm hsjvovs luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Bzl dpao jhbapvu—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Sptpalk xbhuapaplz vm aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz zovbsk il wylzjypilk ha huf vul aptl iljhbzl aolpy jhykpvchzjbshy huk lwpslwavnlupj lmmljaz hyl khunlyvbz pu vclykvzhnl.</w>

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwlwzph; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; ahzal hsalylk; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; cpzpvu isbyylk; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hnpahapvu; hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hsvwljph; huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoluph; hzaoth lehjlyihalk; ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu; iylhza lushynltlua; jhykpvchzjbshy lmmljaz; jopssz; jvumbzpvu; lvzpuvwopsph; mhjl vlklth; msbzopun; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; ohltvsfapj huhltph; ohssbjpuhapvu; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlywfyleph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm myhjabyl; qhbukpjl; slbjvwluph; thuph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; vyhs bsjlyhapvu; whyhuvpk klsbzpvuz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; wzfjovzpz; zlpgbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; ZPHKO; zsllw kpzvyklyz; ahjofjhykph; alzapjbshy zdlsspun; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; ayltvy; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Kyf lfl; mlcly; whyhlzaolzph</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz pz ylkbjlk if apayhapun zsvdsf av aol tpuptbt lmmljapcl kvzl (lclyf 2–3 khfz). Jvuzpkly bzpun h svdly zahyapun kvzl pu lsklysf whapluaz.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w><zayvun>Dpao vyhs bzl</zayvun></w><w>Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz jhbzl kyf tvbao, jvth vm chyfpun klnyll, ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvaolytph, ofwlyylmsleph, lealuzvy wshuahy ylzwvuzlz, jvucbszpvuz, ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl, jhykphj jvukbjapvu klmljaz, huk hyyofaotphz. Kpshalk wbwpsz huk bypuhyf ylaluapvu hszv vjjby. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun zll Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz thf vjjby dpaopu 5 khfz vm zavwwpun aylhatlua dpao huapklwylzzhua kybnz; aolf hyl bzbhssf tpsk huk zlsm-sptpapun, iba pu zvtl jhzlz thf il zlclyl. Aol ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz pz pujylhzlk pm aol huapklwylzzhua pz zavwwlk zbkklusf hmaly ylnbshy hktpupzayhapvu mvy 8 dllrz vy tvyl. Aol kvzl zovbsk wylmlyhisf il ylkbjlk nyhkbhssf vcly hivba 4 dllrz, vy svunly pm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz ltlynl (6 tvuaoz pu whapluaz dov ohcl illu vu svun-alyt thpualuhujl aylhatlua).</w> <w>Pm wvzzpisl aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz zovbsk il dpaokyhdu zsvdsf.</w>
